entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:29 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
